name: UITableViewCell.StateMask
desc: Constants used to determine the new state of a cell as it transitions between states.

items.name: static var showingEditControl: UITableViewCell.StateMask
items.desc: The state of a table view cell when the table view is in editing mode.

items.name: static var showingDeleteConfirmation: UITableViewCell.StateMask
items.desc: The state of a table view cell that shows a button requesting confirmation of a delete gesture.
